DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate once-daily dose ADVAIR 100/50 once-daily superior efficacy comparable safety compare FP 100mcg once-daily pediatric subject 4 11 year age asthma .
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
